languages.text: {n}Девушка берется за кисть и следующие полчаса проводит за светской беседой с вами, умудряясь ни разу не отвести глаз от холста.{/n}
{n}Cassia picks up her brush. Although the two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, she never once looks up from her canvas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка берется за кисть и следующие полчаса проводит за светской беседой с вами, умудряясь ни разу не отвести глаз от холста.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush and spends the next half hour engaged in small talk with you while managing not to look away from the canvas even once.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia prend son pinceau. Bien que vous passiez la demi-heure qui suit à discuter, elle ne lève pas une seule fois les yeux de sa toile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. Although the two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, she never once looks up from her canvas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia prend son pinceau. Bien que vous passiez la demi-heure qui suit à discuter, elle ne lève pas une seule fois les yeux de sa toile.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia coge su pincel. En la media hora que pasáis charlando, no levanta la mirada de su lienzo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. Although the two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, she never once looks up from her canvas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia coge su pincel. En la media hora que pasáis charlando, no levanta la mirada de su lienzo.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅拿起了她的画笔。尽管在接下来的半个小时里，你和她一直都在闲聊，但她的注意力根本没有从画布上移开过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. Although the two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, she never once looks up from her canvas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅拿起了她的画笔。尽管在接下来的半个小时里，你和她一直都在闲聊，但她的注意力根本没有从画布上移开过。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはブラシを拾った。次の30分間二人でむだ話をしたが、彼女は一度もキャンバスから顔を上げることがなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. Although the two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, she never once looks up from her canvas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはブラシを拾った。次の30分間二人でむだ話をしたが、彼女は一度もキャンバスから顔を上げることがなかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia nimmt ihren Pinsel in die Hand. Ihr zwei verbringt zwar die nächste halbe Stunde mit Plaudereien, sie blickt jedoch kein einziges Mal von ihrer Leinwand auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. Although the two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, she never once looks up from her canvas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nimmt ihren Pinsel in die Hand. Ihr zwei verbringt zwar die nächste halbe Stunde mit Plaudereien, sie blickt jedoch kein einziges Mal von ihrer Leinwand auf.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, fırçasını eline alıyor. Sonraki yarım saati önemsiz şeylerden konuşarak geçirseniz de gözlerini bir kez olsun tuvalinden ayırmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. Although the two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, she never once looks up from her canvas.{/n}
